thumb.title: Bay City Electric Works
thumb.description: Bay City Electric Works (BCEW) is a leading provider of power generation solutions, offering KOHLER® generators, backup power systems, rentals, and 24/7 service for commercial, industrial, and residential needs. With decades of expertise, BCEW delivers turnkey power solutions, including design, installation, and maintenance. Trusted by healthcare, data centers, and critical industries, BCEW ensures reliable, efficient power across California with a customer-first approach.Bay City Electric Works8647 Helms Avenue. Rancho Cucamonga, CA 91730866.938.8200https://www.bcew.com/
